## Basic Stock Trading App

<img src="img/stock_trade.png" style="height: 100%; width: 100%; object-fit: contain"/>

<a href="https://tsu2000.shinyapps.io/stock_trading/" target="_blank">Link to web app</a> \| <a href="https://github.com/tsu2000/stock_trading" target="_blank">Code</a><br>

A basic, barebones stock trading app made using the `quantmod` package. The app allows users to select several different stock tickers at once and view their trend as a line chart over a selected time period. It also shows the last publicly traded price. Note: All data is from Yahoo Finance, and the value of stocks is reflective in local currency.
